rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Armu look completely different
depending on the climate and
ecosystem of the country they live in!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It's true! So if you look at the
Armu, you can tell what kind of
state that country is in!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0003
rows.name:
In Superbia, they're more
aggressive! In Luxuria,
they're super fluffy!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Aah! I'd love to go on a
journey to meet all the Armu
of the world, just once!
